caption.p: Establishment of the CVA4 infection model. The CVA4 infection ICR mouse model was established by optimizing three factors: challenge dose, challenge route and mouse age. The body weights (A, B, and C), clinical scores (D, E and F), and survival rates (G, H and I) in each group of neonatal mice ( n = 10–15) were measured. The LD 50 was calculated as 10 2.0 TCID 50/mouse. * P < .05; ** < 0.01; *** P < .001; n.s. non-significant result.
